extendedInfo.description: âTravel From Planet to Planet Playing Golf in an Exciting New Way!âVisit Far Off Nebulas to Figure Out Each Puzzling Hole!âPerfect Your Game to 3 Star Your Score Card!Download a whole new universe of mobile golf games. Dynamic features like jump boosters and space portals bring the Milky Way to the palms of your hand. With each 18 hole course designed with a planetary theme, players can visit the molten lava fields of Mars or the frozen air of Neptune. Shoot for the Stars and play on them as well. With an innovative 3 Star Scoring System (think Angry Birds or Temple Run), master each hole to move on to the next even more challenging level. In addition with our trademark slider controls, storing system, and top notch 3D graphics, Mini Golf Space is Android's first truly out of this world golf game. As seen on YouTube!FEATURES:â¢ 1 of a Kind Golf Game Scoring System.â¢ In App Purchase Includes Over 80 Unique Holes that Range in Difficulty.â¢ Easy to Use Slider Bar and Power Button!â¢ Gorgeous 3D Planetary Environments.â¢ New Courses Updated on the Regular!"I would rate it 6 Stars if I could" â JTT1982"Can't think of a more addictive game I've played" - Raptor"WOW, amazing golf game" -wsopfc05"Best Golf Game in the universe " - DonnaTCONTACT:Please Rate Fairly - If you have any improvements or words to share about the game, please drop us a line at support@beachfrontmedia.com -  We really want to hear what you have to say!

reviews.title: Game does not work!!!!!
reviews.comment: Tried too many times to contact them about this.... Game does not work!!!! Apparently they don\'t care to fix the problem... They have lost a customer!!!! Only gave a star because it wouldn\'t let me leave this comment with out doing so!!!!

reviews.comment: Love the game but it will only let me play mercury venus nebula and eris and wont let me play mini golf stars

reviews.comment: Fun! Fun! Great...
reviews.author: Aaron Wise

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Super Sweet backgrounds, playing puttputt In Spaaaaace! Lol. Looks sick, fun game play. Difficult but its more fun that way. I have yet to complete all 8 planets, and 1 dwarf planet, but when I do, I\'ll start again from the beginning.
reviews.author: Wesley Alexander

reviews.title: Pay for this ? NOT!
reviews.comment: Amnoying ads plus you get only a few levels to play. You have to pay money for more levels. One other problem is the putter is to close to the hit button. Unistalled.
reviews.author: Kevin M.

reviews.title: Gets old quick
reviews.comment: I like the idea but its a pain to play and it does get old
reviews.author: Jake Eckel

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: Stupid thing kept jumping to an add, right from the beginning.  I chose \"play\", add pops.  I chose the course, add pops.  I might have given this a decent review, if I could have even played it.

reviews.comment: Controls suck, no fly over contols really suck.
